newsitem.title: USA: SPSS sees Jandel deal closing in November.
newsitem.headline: SPSS sees Jandel deal closing in November.

text.p: SPSS Inc said Wednesday it expects to complete the acquisition of privately held Jandel Scientific Software by late November.
SPSS on October 8 reported reaching an agreement in principle to the pooling-of-interests transaction valued at about $9 million.
Jandel will be the third scientific software company acquired by SPSS in three years.

Earlier, SPSS reported third-quarter earnings of $0.18 per share compared to $0.20 a year ago. The 1996 results included a charge for the acquisition of CLEAR Software Inc. Excluding the charge, SPSS said current per-share earnings were $0.27.
